entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support limiting CS1591 to certain members #74209
  • IDE0304 should preserve the leading comment #74208
    Backlog
  • Roslyn wrote incorrect timedatestime to PE Coff Header of a .Net 8.0 program file #74200

Closed

  • Error when applying IDE0079 in problems tab #73272
    17.11 P3
  • Builds not reporting source-build prebuilts as errors #69846
  • Please expose an API for detecting assembly-agnostic attributes and modifier types #52119
  • Generate Constructor Quick Action doesn't work on Primary Constructors #73581
    17.11
  • TupleTypeDecoder does not handle pointer types #43857
  • Exclude System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions from source-build #36038
  • Remove prebuilts from source-build #36030
  • EndToEndTests.LongInitializers often times out on linux #69210
    17.11
  • Expose `SeparatedSyntaxList<T>.GetWithSeparators()` through interface #73575
    17.12
  • ProjectChanged Events Triggered More Often #74058
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35027.32 #74197
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35027.161 #74196
  • Outlining no longer obeys preferences #73984

PullRequests

Created

  • MetadataAsSource options #74212
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't reference netstandard1.x packages #74199
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Test PR 73873 #74198
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update insertion config #74202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnumerableConditionalWeakTable and WeakEvent #74160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • On-the-fly-docs update naming #74173
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74191
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge CI fix #74181 into `roles` branch #74204
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Better detect equivalence in our strong name provider #74151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2484362 #74192
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Cherry pick #74034 #74174
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consume new Razor EA #74134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74195
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to move people over to System.Threading.Lock #74170
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add WorkspaceKinds flags enum #74171
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename the record parameter when its property get renamed #74168
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not store temp of ref conditional operator by value #74116
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
